name: The Terrible Claw
description:
Fighting crime isn't easy, but it helps to be armed with tooth and claw! Take the role of private investigator Dex Raptor, full-time detective and dinosaur, as he combats a crime syndicate known as The Terrible Claw. Will these criminals pay the price, or has Dex bitten off more than he can chew?

  • Take a few bites out of crime! Kill hostile thugs and eat them to regain health and stamina.
  • Stalk the night streets! Stay hidden from sight and collect important evidence or unleash your inner (and outer) beast.
  • Rain death from above! Use your powerful jumps to leap from tall buildings and shred enemies with your devastating raptor pounce.
  • Be a dinosaur!
